name: Tricolor Wonders
description:
A short (1-2 hour) JRPG like game about magical girls collecting cards and defeating monsters.

100 cards total, 4 dungeons, cute girls.

Prototype notes:
-Not all cards are accessible.
-Stability not guaranteed
-If you really get stuck or want to see all the cards, check the readme
-Sound may be LOUD, apologies!
